post.description: Return filtered user's information

token.description: the stored (in cookie generally) token to authenticate, it will not be used with account/password/domain

errid.description: the server error id to identify error, e.g. status 500 only

msg.description: the message of the error response, it will not present if there is no error

timestamp.description: the server timestamp to identify error, e.g. status 500 only

oldPassword.description: the old password for verfiying update
